query:
SELECT c.nome AS curso, COUNT(d.id) AS total_disciplinas
FROM cursos c
LEFT JOIN disciplinas d ON d.cursoId = c.id
GROUP BY c.id, c.nome
ORDER BY c.nome;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4Q6CVQSvv4vsSx3.a0e54a3010e2 --database AgAQ7M7gXFHDiuyXgHyZLe --execute SELECT c.nome AS curso, COUNT(d.id) AS total_disciplinas
FROM cursos c
LEFT JOIN disciplinas d ON d.cursoId = c.id
GROUP BY c.id, c.nome
ORDER BY c.nome;
